Scheme 5 Cycloaddition product diversification. Reagents: a)m-CPBA; b) Me3S(O)I, NaH; c) NBS, AIBN, then NaN3; d) Pd(OH)2/C, TBHP, K2CO3; e) CH3NO2, DBU; f) KHMDS, BnBr, HMPA; g) OsO4, NMO; h) Pb(OAc)4, then NaBH3CN, BnNH2, AcOH; i) Me3SiCHN2,nBuLi; j) TsOH; k) DIBAL; l) MeC(OEt)3, PivOH; m) Pd/C, H2; n) RuCl3⋅3 H2O, NaIO4. AIBN=2,2′-azobisisobutyronitrile, DIBAL=diisobutylaluminum hydride, DBU=1,8-diazabicyclo[5.4.0]undec-7-ene, HMDS=hexamethyldisilazide,m-CPBA=meta-chloroperbenzoic acid, NBS=N-bromosuccinimide, NMO=N-methylmorpholineN-oxide, Piv=pivaloyl, TBHP=tert-butyl hydrogen peroxide.
